attributes.contentHtml: So I use to work as a developer in darynodes and I am explaining you my experience. So when I join I saw a very good welcoming staff and owner is also of very good nature as well. Staff are really hard working except some staffs are creating mess. Owner and staff never abuse even when someone abuse them or say something to owner or staff. This whole thread is only made because One kid who want to get his shitty smp sponser and try to spam dms and ddos darynode.

Shershah That really explains everything!

A little bit of context: A person (lets call him Akshay's friend) wanted to host a bedwars event along with his friends. Akshay wanted to provide him with a vps for the Minecraft server with decent specs for FREE which sounded hella sketchy to me. I never talked with Akshay about it, but Akshay's friend provided me with some information about it.
